title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: LMS Multimedia Design and Cognitive Load Optimization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain the placement principles of multimedia elements in LMS based on cognitive load theory.
Learners can reconstruct content by applying redundancy, continuity, and signaling principles in VR simulation environments.
Learners can derive design improvements through formative assessments and measure cognitive load reduction effects.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
